Uses of Package
StateMachine

Packages that use StateMachine
StateMachine   
test   
 

Classes in StateMachine used by StateMachine
Call
          Each Command and State has a Call Object, which is called on entry for States and on process for Commands, it is able to inform an Object about the changes within the StateMachine
Command
          A Command is used to define the edges between the States.
State
          A state consists of a status, a message, a callable Call-Object which is called on entry and a Map mapping other States to Commands.
StateException
          StateException is raised by StateMachine whenever there is no edge StateException.c from StateException.oldState
 

Classes in StateMachine used by test
Call
          Each Command and State has a Call Object, which is called on entry for States and on process for Commands, it is able to inform an Object about the changes within the StateMachine
Command
          A Command is used to define the edges between the States.
State
          A state consists of a status, a message, a callable Call-Object which is called on entry and a Map mapping other States to Commands.
StateException
          StateException is raised by StateMachine whenever there is no edge StateException.c from StateException.oldState
StateMachine
          Implements a DFA, where the edges are Commands and the vertices are States.
